panels.description:
Control Plane is available. Self-healing is working.

Group result is a combination of probe results with the priority of the worst results.

Up: all probes are up. 
Down: at least one probe is down. 
Unknown: uncertain result, see probe results for clues. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Cluster main probes overall

panels.description:
Checks the availability of deckhouse and working hook.

panels.title: Nginx overall

panels.description:
The probe requests /version endpoint from kube-apiserver

Up: /version returns 200 OK.
Down: /version returns other codes or there is no connection to kube-apiserver.
Unknown: connection to kube-apiserver is slow.
Nodata: agents were stopped
panels.title: Api Server

panels.description:
Every 5s a ConfigMap is created and deleted.

Up: configMap successfully created and deleted. 
Down: error occurred during the creation or deletion of the ConfigMap. 
Unknown: kube-apiserver is not available or probe execution is skipped because previous probe was not yet finished. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Basic Functionality

panels.description:
Every 1 minute a certificate is created and deleted to check the cert-manager handling of it

Up: certificate secret was created, and after the certificate was deleted, the secret disappeared. 
Down: certificate secret was not created in 5 seconds, or was no deleted in 20 seconds. 
Unknown: error occurred during creation or deletion, or kube-apiserver is not available. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Cert Manager

panels.description:
Every 1 minute a Deployment is created and deleted

Up: deployment successfully created, and its Pod became Pending. Afterwards, the deployment successfully deleted. 
Down: created Pod has not become Pending  after 10 seconds. 
Unknown: error occurred during creation or deletion, or kube-apiserver is not available, or probe execution is skipped because previous probe was not yet finished. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Controller Manager

panels.description:
Every 1 minute a Namespace is created and deleted

Up: namespace successfully created and deleted. 
Down: created Namespace is not deleted after 1 minute. 
Unknown: error during create or delete  operations, kube-apiserver is not available or operations are slow. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Namespace

panels.description:
Every 1 minute a Pod is created, scheduled to a matching node and deleted

Up: pod successfully created and scheduled to a node. 
Down: created Pod is not scheduled within 20 seconds. 
Unknown: error during create or delete operations, kube-apiserver is not available or probe execution is skipped because previous probe was not yet finished. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Scheduler

panels.description:
Cluster configurations is contolled by Deckhouse

Up: Deckhouse pod is Ready state in 20 minutes, and test hook reacts on custom resourse changes. 
Down: Deckhouse pod is not in Ready state for more than 20 minutes, or hook does not react to custom resource. 
Unknown: error occurred during pod fetching, or pod is terminating, or kube-apiserver is not available, or probe execution is skipped because previous probe was not yet finished. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Cluster Configuration

panels.description:
General-purpose web UI for the cluster

Up: at least one Pod of Dashboard is in Ready state. 
Down: there are no pods of Dashboard in Ready state. 
Unknown: error occurred during pods fetching, or kube-apiserver is not available, or probe execution is skipped because previous probe was not yet finished. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Kubernetes Dashboard

panels.title: Prometheus-longterm

panels.description:
The Horizontal Pod Autoscaler automatically changes the number of replicas

Up: both probes of Prometheus Metrics Adapter and Controller Manager are successful. 
Down: at least one of probes of Prometheus.  Metrics Adapter or Controller Manager failed. 
Unknown: at least one of probes of Prometheus Metrics Adapter or Controller Manager has unknown result but none of them failed. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Horizontal Pod Autoscaler

panels.description:
Key cluster metrics are metrics from the Kubernetes, nodes and containers.

Up: metrics from all key components are present in Prometheus and are non-zero. 
Down: at least one of metrics is absent or has zero value. 
Unknown: (unexpected). 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Key Metrics Present

panels.description:
Key metric sources are from nodes and Kubernetes.

Up: all pods of node-exporter, and at least one Pod of kube-state-metrics is in Ready state. 
Down: at least one Pod of node-exporter, or all pods of kube-state-metrics are not in Ready state. 
Unknown: kube-apiserver is not available. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Metrics Sources

panels.description:
Prometheus is a monitoring system.

Up: at least one Pod is in Ready state, and the Prometheus API responds correctly. 
Down: either no ready Pods present, or Prometheus responds with invalid data. 
Unknown: kube-apiserver is not available. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Prometheus

panels.description:
Prometheus Metrics Adapter provides metrics for the cluster (nodes, containers, etc.)

Up: at least one Pod is in Ready state and the custom metrics CR contains non-zero value. 
Down: either no ready Pods present, or adapter metrics response is invalid. 
Unknown: kube-apiserver is not available. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Prometheus-metrics-adapter

panels.description:
Trickster is an HTTP reverse proxy/cache for Prometheus

Up: at least one Pod is in Ready state, and the Trickster API responds correctly. 
Down: either no ready Pods present, or Trickster responds with invalid data. 
Unknown: kube-apiserver is not available. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Trickster

panels.description:
The Vertical Pod Autoscaler automatically changes resources acquired by pods (CPU, memory)

Up: at least one Pod of a VPA component is in Ready state. 
Down: a Pod of at least one VPA component is not in Ready state. 
Unknown: kube-apiserver is not available. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Vertical Pod Autoscaler

panels.description:
Every 5 seconds resolve sample application IPs and request / endpoint until first success

Up: resolve is successful and all IPs are responded with 200 OK. 
Down: some IP responded with other code. 
Unknown: error during resolve or application is responded slow. 
Nodata: agents were stopped.
panels.title: Access

Nodata: agents were stopped.
